title: Achievement Emotion-Based Self-Regulated Learning and Motivation Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with learning strategies
context.additional_context: Practical skill-centered course utilizing VR simulations and mobile-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and regulate achievement emotions (e.g., confidence, interest, anxiety) during math problem-solving via VR simulations.
Learners improve math problem-solving efficiency by 20% or more within a week using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can establish personalized learning plans that sustain motivation based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
